ch.psi.bitshuffle

Interface BitShuffleLZ4Compressor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BitShuffleLZ4JNICompressor

    public interface BitShuffleLZ4Compressor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compress(ByteBuffer src, int srcOff, ByteBuffer dest, int destOff, int nElements, int bytesPerElement, int blockSize)
      Compress src into dest and return the compressed length.
      int maxCompressedLength(int nElements, int bytesPerElement, int blockSize)
      The max possible size after compression.

    • Method Detail

      • compress

        int compress(ByteBuffer src,
             int srcOff,
             ByteBuffer dest,
             int destOff,
             int nElements,
             int bytesPerElement,
             int blockSize)
        Compress src into dest and return the compressed length. ByteBuffer positions remain unchanged.
        Parameters:
        src - The src ByteBuffer
        srcOff - The src offset (where compression should start)
        dest - The dest ByteBuffer
        destOff - The dest offset (where the compressed bytes should be stored)
        nElements - The number of elements in src
        bytesPerElement - The bytes used to represent one element
        blockSize - The block size to use (recommended to use 0 for auto selection)
        Returns:
        int The compressed bytes

      • maxCompressedLength

        int maxCompressedLength(int nElements,
                        int bytesPerElement,
                        int blockSize)
        The max possible size after compression.
        Parameters:
        nElements - The number of elements in src
        bytesPerElement - The bytes used to represent one element
        blockSize - The block size to use (recommended to use 0 for auto selection)
        Returns:
        int The max size
